headline.print_headline: An Embrace for a Survivor Who Studied the Bombing
headline.main: Hiroshima Survivor Cries, and Obama Gives Him a Hug

snippet: Shigeaki Mori, who was 8 when the United States dropped the bomb, spent decades researching the fates of American P.O.W.s killed in Hiroshima.
abstract: Pres Obama shares emotional embrace with Shigeaki Mori, survivor of 1945 bombing at Hiroshima, Japan, after delivering address there.
